domains.title: About
domains.body:
# ~> select * from **About;** # Kaung SiThu ## _ Data Engineer & Analytics Enthusiast _ Life is short. Let's make technology work for us for the better of humanity.

**Hello there! Welcome to my portfolio page.** I'm driven by a passion for transforming raw data into actionable insights. I thrive on building robust data pipelines and crafting solutions that empower data-driven decision-making. My expertise lies in data engineering, cloud technologies, and system integration. I believe technology should serve humanity, and I'm always eager to explore innovative ways to make that happen.
### **[[üöÄ Explore Career Journey | career-journey]]** ### **[[üñ• Browse Showcase | showcase]]** ### [**üì• Download Resume (PDF)**](/assets/Kaung%20SiThu%20-%20Resume.pdf) ## üìä Career Insights ### Education and Career Timeline [![A chart of my education and career in timeline format.](/assets/images/career-timeline.jpg)](https://kaungsithu.github.io/notes/ap3o9rbjjjnk0vy7jsyu1b8) ### Skill Composition ![A donut chart of my overall skill compositions](/assets/images/skill-composition.jpg) ### Experience Years of Skills ![A bar graph of my top skills and their years of experience](/assets/images/skill-experience.jpg) ## üì¨ Contact Information I'd love to connect and discuss data engineering and analytics! - ‚úâÔ∏è - ** kaungsithu.kaungsithu@gmail.com ** - ![](/assets/images/linkedin-logo.png) - ** linkedin.com/in/ksithu **

domains.title: Career Journey
domains.body:
# ~> select * from **CareerJourney;** ## üßë‚Äçüíª Summary A highly motivated and results-driven data engineer passionate about building scalable, high-impact data solutions. With over a decade of experience, I specialize in designing and optimizing data platforms, pipelines, and analytics systems that drive business value. My expertise spans fintech, banking, and manufacturing automation, where I‚Äôve solved complex data challenges, improved workflows, and mentored teams to elevate data capabilities. I believe that technology isn‚Äôt just about efficiency‚Äîit‚Äôs a catalyst for innovation and meaningful change. I thrive in dynamic environments, collaborating across teams to unlock the full potential of data.
![[career-journey.skills#-key-skills]] ![[career-journey.experience#-experience-details]] ![[career-journey.certifications#-professional-certifications]] ![[career-journey.education#-education-details]] ![[career-journey.additional-experience#-public-speaking--knowledge-sharing]] ![[career-journey.additional-experience#-achievements--recognitions]] ![[career-journey.additional-experience#-projects--contributions]] ## üì• Download Resume [** Download Resume (PDF) **](/assets/Kaung%20SiThu%20-%20Resume.pdf)
